title: Stan Lee Presents The Incredible Hulk #2
description: Includes stories originally published in Tales to Astonish #85-#99 (1966-1968).The Missile and the Monster! --The Birth of ... the Hulk-Killer! --The Humanoid and the Hero! --Boomerang and the Brute! --...Then, There Shall Come a Stranger! --The Abomination! --Whosoever Harms the Hulk..! --Turning Point! --He Who Strikes the Silver Surfer --..To the Beckoning Stars! --A World He Never Made! --What Have I Created? --The Legions of: The Living Lightning --The Puppet and the Power! --When the Monster Wakes!
author: Stan Lee
